page.title: 03SYMINGTON SCHOOL IN 1985
page.content: Symington Primary School was opened on the 31st of May 1968 so that means it is 17 years old.It was opened by Mrs Anderson.Children from 5-12 years attend. In the school there are 8 classrooms a Primary{1,2,3,4,5,6 and}7.Room 8 is the General Purposes room which is used to watch T.V. in and do sewing. There are composite classes.Which means Primary 1 and 2 are in the same classroom because there are not enough children to make up full classes. The teachers are Mrs.Kathleen Chisholm(P.1/2),Mrs.Kirsty Goudie(P.1/2),Mrs Margaret Waugh(P4),Mrs Catherine Cano(P5/6),and Miss Johanne Picken,Miss Fiona Lough(P7).Miss Picken is also the Headteatcher. The secretary is Mrs.Holmes and the janitor is Mr.Robb.
